mapper.insert: insert into Doc_Document (fID, fDocID, fDocName, fExtName, fDocSize, fDocType, fAddTime, fUpdateTime, version) values (#{fID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fDocID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fDocName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fExtName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fDocSize,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{fDocType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fAddTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update Doc_Document set fDocID = #{fDocID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fDocName = #{fDocName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fExtName = #{fExtName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fDocSize = #{fDocSize,jdbcType=FLOAT}, fDocType = #{fDocType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fUpdateTime = #{fUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER} where fID = #{fID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
